questions.question: MS Dhoni has won more Player of the Match awards in ODIs than any other player.
Sachin Tendulkar holds the record for most Player of the Match awards in Test cricket.
Virat Kohli has won the ICC Cricketer of the Year award more than once.
Jacques Kallis has won more Player of the Match awards than any other all-rounder.
Shane Warne never won the ICC Player of the Year award during his career.
Mithali Raj holds the record for most Player of the Match awards in women's ODIs.
Ricky Ponting has won more Player of the Series awards in Test cricket than any other captain.
AB de Villiers has never won the ICC ODI Player of the Year award.
Shahid Afridi holds the record for most Player of the Match awards in T20Is.
Brian Lara won Player of the Match when he scored his record 400 not out.
